author: gbyu
body: This work is to improve the PFmuon quality in coming run2 data taking in which a huge track multiplicity is expected. Because of the good track granularity, many fake muons can be reconstructed as a good muon. In order to reduce the fake muon, a study is performed to use track only isolation in the PF muon algorithm.
title: Changed to use track only isolation for PFmuon
